title: Can you compare science and technology in developing and developed countries along with materials and equipment? - Quora

response.answer_text: The science and technology of the stone age was limited to what could be done with and to a stone. The science and technology we have of today is what we have learned about stones and what we can do with them in their so many different varieties.
Developing countries have more materials and equipment at their disposal, and this contributes to their progress in science and technology.
